name: angle-parser
description: Parses horizontal and vertical angle information and indicates when a predefined region is selected. Useful for determining speaker position with beamforming microphones.
author: Patrick Murray

parameters.name: Debug
parameters.tooltip: Prints debug messages when enabled.

parameters.name: Debounce Delay Time
parameters.placeholder: Enter the delay time in milliseconds.
parameters.tooltip: The time in milliseconds to wait before recalculating the current region.

parameters.name: publishChangesOnly
parameters.tooltip: When true, the current region value is published only when the region changes.

parameters.name: Region 1 Minimum Elevation
parameters.placeholder: Enter the minimum value for this region's elevation
parameters.tooltip: The minimum elevation value for this region.

parameters.name: Region 1 Maximum Elevation
parameters.placeholder: Enter the maximum value for this region's elevation
parameters.tooltip: The maximum elevation value for this region.

parameters.name: Region 1 Minimum Azimuth
parameters.placeholder: Enter the minimum value for this region's azimuth
parameters.tooltip: The minimum azimuth value for this region.

parameters.name: Region 1 Maximum Azimuth
parameters.placeholder: Enter the maximum value for this region's azimuth
parameters.tooltip: The maximum azimuth value for this region.

parameters.placeholder: Enter the minimum value for this region's elevation
parameters.tooltip: The minimum elevation value for this region.

descriptions.title: Description
descriptions.body: Sets the elevation and calculates the current region.

descriptions.title: Description
